seo: Oracle WebLogic,XMLDecoder,反序列化漏洞,Java应用服务器
summary: 该插件用于检测Oracle WebLogic Server是否存在XMLDecoder反序列化漏洞，通过构造特定的SOAP请求并利用DNSLog验证漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the Oracle WebLogic Server has the XMLDecoder deserialization vulnerability by constructing a specific SOAP request and using DNSLog to verify the existence of the vulnerability.
